nodes.text: This Research lab was located within the Jedi Temple and was in use of Doctor Gubacher. It was used to keep operational droids in contact for the Jedi for later uses at maximum condition during the Clone Wars.

Around 20 BBY, this lab was used by Doctor Gubacher to prepare D-Squad for a infiltration mission onboard a Separatist Dreadnaught to retrieve an Encryption module. It also was used to remove M5-BZ's memory banks to make room for the Coronel's command center to guide D-Squad through its mission.
